name: Toe II Toe
description:
Toe II Toe is a mini fighting game in a retro gameboy style for the 20 second Game Jam! You have your feet planted on the ground, ready for a slugfest. Punch, duck, or block your way to victory!

Controls

Touch the buttons or if you prefer the keyboard:

PLAYER 1PLAYER 2Q - BlockO - BlockA - DuckL - DuckW - JabI - JabS - HookK - Hook Changelog
  • v 1.1.0 (2022.12.07)
    • added keyboard hotkey info on buttons
    • added score above lifebar for single player
  • v 1.0.0 - Initial Release
